oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Energies and relative intensities of K(alpha 3) and K(alpha 4) X-ray satellites of phosphorous by photon excitation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MURTI, MVR
SURESH, P
RAJU, SS
NAGARAJU, GJ
RAB, VK
REDDY, BS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: multiplet structure
spectrum
x-ray satellites
relative intensities
phosphorous
crystal spectrometer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Energies and relative intensities ofthe K X-ray satellites K(alpha 4) and K(alpha 3) of phosphorous and three of its compounds (NH(4))(2)HPO(4), Na(2)HPO(4) and BaHPO(4) were measured by a wavelength dispersive spectrometer. The energy shifts of these satellites relative to the diagram line are compared with Dirac-Fock theoretical values. The energy shifts and relative intensities are examined for chemical effects. (C) 2008
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: NUCLEAR INSTRUMENTS & METHODS IN PHYSICS RESEARCH SECTION B-BEAM INTERACTIONS WITH MATERIALS AND ATOMS, 266(22), 4869-4871
